elements.content: Create a basic HTML page with a [[gray]]<!DOCTYPE>[[/]], [[lightpurple]]<html>[[/]], empty [[lightpurple]]<head>[[/]], and empty [[lightpurple]]<body>[[/]].

Hit CTRL+S to update the preview, and use the preview tab to see the webpage displayed, and use the snippets tab to insert a snippet. Click the move on button when you are ready to move to the next page.
